data.title: Sinopharm Vaccine Gets WHO Backing, Facilitating Broader Use
data.meta_description: China’s Sinopharm Group Co. won World Health Organization backing for its Covid-19 vaccine, paving the way for a wider rollout of the shot in countries scrambling for immunizations.
data.text:
China-made vaccine will add to supply for Covax global effort

Questions remain about efficacy compared with other shots

China’s Sinopharm Group Co. won World Health Organization backing for its Covid-19 vaccine, paving the way for a wider rollout of the shot in countries scrambling for immunizations.

The WHO listed the vaccine for emergency use, Director General Tedros Adhanom Ghebreyesus said in a tweet on Friday. It’s recommended for adults age 18 and over.
